ygData.subject: Re: Response to Sol Ro Bash
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/23/99 7:21:53 AM Pacific Daylight Time, MFerrulo@aol.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/23/99 7:21:53 AM Pacific Daylight Time, MFerrulo@...
writes:

<< Solusek Ro is probably the worst roleplaying server that exists
and is almost exclusively a power gaming -hey dude- you suck - cool man! -
server. >>

While this is very true of many of the zones if your looking for people
that are really role-playing their Char's go to the swamp or Guk. I play a
troll shaman and everyone (almost) is role-playing their chars. Other than
that If I had a way to switch my chars to a different server I would in a
Everquest Minute.
